The '''Roll''' was a list made and learned by heart by Shire-historians. The Roll contained the names of all those [[Hobbits]] who fought in the [[Battle of Bywater]]. In all accounts of the Roll, Captains [[Meriadoc Brandybuck]] and [[Peregrin Took]] always appear to be listed first at the top of the list. Some of the other Hobbits on the list include the likes of [[Samwise Gamgee]], [[Farmer Cotton]], [[Tolman Cotton Junior|Young Tom]], [[Wilcome Cotton II|Jolly]] and [[Bowman Cotton|Nick Cotton]].

In latter years, the rise of fame and fortune of the [[Cotton Family|Cottons]] dates from this time.<ref>{{RK|VI8}}</ref>
